problem: 如图,C、M是线段AB上的两点,且点M是线段AC的中点,若AB=8cm,BC=2cm,则AM的长为()
answer: 【解答】:由图形可知AC=AB-BC=8-2=6cm,∵M是线段AC的中点,∴AM=AC=3cm．故AM的长为3cm．
comment: 考查了两点间的距离的计算；求出与所求线段相关的线段AC的长是解决本题的突破点．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, C and M are two points on the line segment AB, and the point M is the midpoint of the line segment AC. If AB = N_0, BC = N_1, then the length of AM is ()
